data.name: Beodara
data.detailed_description:
Beodara is a game that takes place during the Middle Ages.
You and your opponent will control a character who will be able to gather resources with different aims : build your village, hire peasants as well as knights and many other soldiers.
You will have the possibility to buy weapons and many kinds of upgrades for your character, your village and your troups !
What for ? Simply to destroy what your opponent has built before he does the same with you !
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: You and your opponent will control a character who will be able to gather resources with different aims : build your village, hire peasants as well as knights and many other soldiers.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64 bit 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bit 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2,8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
